Name: The Call Centre
About the game: The Call Centre is a Visual Novel game in which you take the role of a call centre agent on their first day of the job ready to take calls from customers having technical issues. You’ll help identify and solve their problems. Or maybe not. Features -Different customers with their own problems and personalities. -Multiple choices of how to respond to each call -Hilarious scenarios and responses -Input from your fellow colleagues -Performance will be reviewed This is a fantastic opportunity if you want to get yourself in a new role. You don’t need years of call centre experience to join the team; just desperation enough to do the job. Please, please APPLY ASAP
